help.name: Publish Game Help
help.reference: Reference Websites (a network proxy may be required)

vndb.name: VNDB ID
vndb.help: We require every game to have a VNDB ID. The VNDB ID can be found on the official VNDB website (vndb.org). When you navigate to the game's page, the part of the URL (such as https://vndb.org/v19658) after 'v' is the VNDB ID. After entering the ID and clicking 'Fetch Data', we will attempt to retrieve the game's title and description (both in English) from VNDB.
vndb.info: When fetching data, we will automatically check if the game is a duplicate.

title.name: Title
title.help: At least one title is required.

introduction.name: Introduction
introduction.help: At least one introduction is required.

banner.name: Preview Image
banner.help: Game preview images should ideally be taken directly from within the game at their original resolution, without including screen borders or device frames. Preferably, the width should be greater than the height. The final loaded size of the image will be reduced to no larger than 1920 × 1080 pixels.
banner.hint:
Preview images must not contain sensitive content such as R18 materials.
The width should preferably be greater than the height.

series.name: Game Series
series.hint: If there are multiple games, please separate each entry with an English comma
series.placeholder: Please enter game IDs (internal site IDs can be found in the information section of individual game pages), for example `Choco Sweet Love 1, Choco Sweet Love 2, Choco Sweet Love 3` would be a series, so you would fill in `18, 19, 20`

official.name: Official Website
official.hint: If there are multiple official websites, please separate each link with an English comma
official.placeholder: Please enter the official website link

alias.name: Aliases
alias.hint: Up to 17 aliases, press Enter after typing an alias to create it

engine.name: Game Engine
engine.hint: If there are multiple engines, please separate each engine with an English comma
engine.placeholder: Please enter the name of the game engine, such as KiriKiri, RUGP, Shiina Rio, multiple entries allowed

tags.name: Game Tags
tags.hint: If there are multiple tags, please separate each tag with an English comma
tags.placeholder: Please enter game tags, such as RPG, ACT, Pure Love, etc.

pr.name: Update Request
pr.help: Blue indicates additions, red indicates deletions. Game publishers or administrators can merge or decline requests.
pr.reason: Please provide a reason for declining.
pr.note: You can merge your own update requests.
pr.hint: To process this request, requires the resource publisher or administrator.

report.note: This report is completely anonymous. No user records will be kept in the admin panel or database. Please feel free to report.

agreement.title: User Agreement
agreement.description: 1. Anything posted by the user has nothing to do with the Yuzu Game Forum, 2. The Yuzu Game Forum is only a Web development project. 3. We have the right to block users when they make behaviors that are detrimental to the maintenance of our open source projects. 4. Due to user account theft and other losses, Yuzu game forum does not bear

category.title: Topic category
category.description: Topic classification/zoning, game walkthrough, game chat, game seeking resources, game information, game new news, game resources download Web, programming languages,Linux, practical technology,AI, reverse engineering,Android,Adobe, algorithms, animation, manga, music, light novel
category.g-walkthrough: Game walkthrough, game walkthrough, full CG save, patch, and download, etc.
category.g-chatting: Chatting game chat, chatting game chat, chatting game chat, chatting game chat, chatting game chat, chatting game chat, chatting game chat
category.g-article: Game articles, some long game articles, suitable for impressions and other articles
category.g-seeking: The game seeks resources, finds resources, can ask questions about the game resources that can't be found
category.g-news: Game information, new Chinese information, new dynamic information and other game-related information
category.g-releases: Releases new releases, which new clubs have released which releases, where, and how to buy them
category.g-other: Everything related to the game, including some games that are not included in the scope of the VNDB
category.t-web: Web, Web app development, JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js, React / Next.js, Vue / Nuxt, Angular, Solid, Svelte
category.t-languages: Programming languages, C language, JavaScript, C++ / cpp, Java, Python, Rust, C#
category.t-help: If you have any questions that need to be solved, please ask here
category.t-linux: Linux, sudo pacman -Syu, chmod -R 777 /, dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sda, alias cd rm -rf ./*
category.t-practical: Practical technology, game Chinese technology, practical software sharing, practical website sharing, practical skills sharing
category.t-ai: AI, self-supervised Learning, GANs, quantum computing, Transformer, Deep Learning, Federated Learning, GNN, Explainable AI, etc.
category.t-crack: Reverse engineering, Windows Reverse, Android/Android Reverse, IOS Reverse, vulnerability attack, black box attack, data breach prediction, DDoS, SQL Injection, xss
category.t-android: Android, Java, Kotlin, RxJava, Jetpack Compose, flutter
category.t-adobe: Adobe, Adobe Photoshop(PS), Adobe Illustrator(AI), Adobe Premiere Pro(PR), Adobe Audition(AU),  Adobe After Effects(AE)
category.t-algorithm: Algorithm, Sort, DFS, BFS, A Search, Greedy, Union Find, Hashing, BT, BST, FT, Backtracking
category.t-other: Anything related to technology as you know it, limited to medicine, agriculture, engineering, literature, business, cryptography, sociology, management, etc.
category.o-daily: Daily, record the daily stories of your life
category.o-essay: Personal essay, write anything, say whatever comes to mind
category.o-forum: Forum related, problem feedback, new feature requests, everything related to this forum
